title: Chapter 1129 - The Tailor!
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1129 - The Tailor!

Qing Tang’s words were light and airy, but the crowd couldn’t help but tremble! 

Don’t tell me the terrifying expert who replaced Buddhist Master Inkstone Heart is here too?

As the crowd stood there in bewilderment, a calm, pleasant voice exclaimed, “Impressive. Over the years, I’ve always wondered just who you were, Qing Tang. Now, I think I can finally guess.” 

There was a disturbance amongst the distant onlookers, and a slender figure emerged from the crowd and took to the skies.

She wore pristine white robes, and her bearing was tranquil and serene. This was none other than the young mistress of the Studio of the Heart!

Waves of uproar broke out on all sides. None of them had anticipated that, just months after the Swordmaster of Abstruse Force scared her off, the young mistress of the Studio of the Heart would reveal herself once more.

Su Yi furrowed his brow, then transmitted to the Heavensdeath Demon Empress, “If fighting breaks out, help me protect my disciples.”

She subtly inclined her head. She could sense that the situation was silently shifting and that it was highly likely an unpredictable storm was about to strike!

Off in the distance, Qing Tang glanced at the young mistress of the Studio of the Heart and...
